     386                 :            : 
     387                 :          0 : void MDAL::DriverFlo2D::createMesh1d( const std::string &datFileName, const std::vector<MDAL::DriverFlo2D::CellCenter> &cells, std::map<size_t, size_t> &cellsIdToVertex )
     388                 :            : {
     389                 :            :   //    In flow 2D, each 1D node can be defined by one or two cell id, corresponding to the left bank and the right bank.
     390                 :            :   //    If there is only one id associated with the node, the cell id is the left bank, and the right bank has id cell equal to 0.
     391                 :            :   //    Consequences for the (X, Y) position of the node/vertex :
     392                 :            :   //    - if only one cell (the left bank id cell), the position of the node is this left bank cell position.
     393                 :            :   //    - if two cells, left bank and right bank, the position of the node is the centre of the segment [left bank, right bank].
     394                 :            :   //
     395                 :            :   //    parseCHANBANKFile() creates a map between cells and 1D vertex (in MDAL sens):  cellsIdToVertex.
     396                 :            :   //    Each cell id (key), left bank and right bank if it exists, is mapped with a node/vertex (value is vertex index).
     397                 :            :   //    Vertex indexes are the position of the node in the CHANBANK file. As right bank cell could be associated with several nodes,
     398                 :            :   //    when consecutive edges are not colinear (seen in the test data file, for example, line 57-58 and 61-62 of the CHANBANK.DAT test file).
     399                 :            :   //    In this case, those duplicated right banks are stored in another map: duplicatedRightBankToVertex (key: right bank cell, value: vector of indexes of associated vertex).
     400                 :            :   //
     401                 :            :   //    Once the links between left/right bank cells and vertices are defined, the following step is to calculate the effective (X, Y) position of each vertex.
     402                 :            :   //    For that, all the cells are iterated :
     403                 :            :   //    If the id cell is contained in the cellsIdToVertex map and the vertex has not already has been its coordinates filled (vertices are initiated with NaN coordinate),
     404                 :            :   //    then this vertex takes the coordinate of the corresponding cell.
     405                 :            :   //    If the id cell is contained in the cellsIdToVertex map and the vertex coordinates are not NaN, that means that the vertex is associated with two banks,
     406                 :            :   //    so add the second coordinates to the first and multiply by factor 0.5 to average the coordinates.
     407                 :            :   //
     408                 :            :   //    As the id cells could correspond to a cell that is a right bank associated with severals vertex,
     409                 :            :   //    do the same with duplicatedRightBankToVertex that contain the vertices associated with the duplicated right bank.
     410                 :            :   //
     411                 :            :   //    How the cellsIdToVertex and duplicatedRightBankToVertex maps are created, each vertex could not be present more than twice in those maps.
     412                 :            : 
     413                 :          0 :   std::map<size_t, std::vector<size_t>> duplicatedRightBankToVertex;
     414                 :          0 :   std::vector<Vertex> vertices;
     415                 :          0 :   std::vector<Edge> edges;
     416                 :            :   size_t verticesCount;
     417                 :            : 
     418                 :          0 :   parseCHANBANKFile( datFileName, cellsIdToVertex, duplicatedRightBankToVertex, verticesCount );
     419                 :          0 :   vertices = std::vector<Vertex>( verticesCount );
     420                 :            : 
     421                 :          0 :   for ( const MDAL::DriverFlo2D::CellCenter &cell : cells )
     422                 :            :   {
     423                 :          0 :     std::map<size_t, size_t>::const_iterator it = cellsIdToVertex.find( cell.id );
     424                 :          0 :     if ( it != cellsIdToVertex.end() )
     425                 :            :     {
     426                 :          0 :       if ( it->second < vertices.size() )
     427                 :            :       {
     428                 :          0 :         Vertex &vertex = vertices[it->second];
     429                 :            :         //if coordinates of vertex is not nan, those coordinates are the first bank, so add the second and use factor 0.5
     430                 :          0 :         if ( std::isnan( vertex.x ) )
     431                 :            :         {
     432                 :          0 :           vertex.x = cell.x;
     433                 :          0 :           vertex.y = cell.y;
     434                 :          0 :         }
     435                 :            :         else
     436                 :            :         {
     437                 :          0 :           vertex.x += cell.x;
     438                 :          0 :           vertex.x *= 0.5;
     439                 :          0 :           vertex.y += cell.y;
     440                 :          0 :           vertex.y *= 0.5;
     441                 :            :         }
     442                 :          0 :       }
     443                 :          0 :     }
     444                 :            : 
     445                 :          0 :     std::map<size_t, std::vector<size_t>>::const_iterator itDuplicated = duplicatedRightBankToVertex.find( cell.id );
     446                 :          0 :     if ( itDuplicated != duplicatedRightBankToVertex.end() )
     447                 :            :     {
     448                 :          0 :       const std::vector<size_t> &indexes = itDuplicated->second;
     449                 :          0 :       for ( size_t index : indexes )
     450                 :            :       {
     451                 :          0 :         if ( index < vertices.size() )
     452                 :            :         {
     453                 :          0 :           Vertex &vertex = vertices[index];
     454                 :          0 :           if ( std::isnan( vertex.x ) )
     455                 :            :           {
     456                 :          0 :             vertex.x = cell.x;
     457                 :          0 :             vertex.y = cell.y;
     458                 :          0 :           }
     459                 :            :           else
     460                 :            :           {
     461                 :          0 :             vertex.x += cell.x;
     462                 :          0 :             vertex.x *= 0.5;
     463                 :          0 :             vertex.y += cell.y;
     464                 :          0 :             vertex.y *= 0.5;
     465                 :            :           }
     466                 :          0 :         }
     467                 :            :       }
     468                 :          0 :     }
     469                 :            :   }
     470                 :            : 
     471                 :          0 :   parseCHANFile( datFileName, cellsIdToVertex, edges );
     472                 :          0 :   mMesh.reset( new MemoryMesh( name(), 0, mDatFileName ) );
     473                 :          0 :   mMesh->setVertices( std::move( vertices ) );
     474                 :          0 :   mMesh->setEdges( std::move( edges ) );
     475                 :          0 : }

     807                 :          0 : void MDAL::DriverFlo2D::createMesh2d( const std::vector<CellCenter> &cells, const BBox &cellCenterExtent, double cell_size )
     808                 :            : {
     809                 :            :   // Create all Faces from cell centers.
     810                 :            :   // Vertexs must be also created, they are not stored in FLO-2D files
     811                 :            :   // try to reuse Vertexs already created for other Faces by usage of unique_Vertexs set.
     812                 :            : 
     813                 :          0 :   double half_cell_size = cell_size / 2;
     814                 :          0 :   Faces faces( cells.size(), Face( 4 ) );
     815                 :            : 
     816                 :          0 :   BBox vertexExtent( cellCenterExtent.minX - half_cell_size,
     817                 :          0 :                      cellCenterExtent.maxX + half_cell_size,
     818                 :          0 :                      cellCenterExtent.minY - half_cell_size,
     819                 :          0 :                      cellCenterExtent.maxY + half_cell_size );
     820                 :            : 
     821                 :          0 :   size_t width = MDAL::toSizeT( ( vertexExtent.maxX - vertexExtent.minX ) / cell_size + 1 );
     822                 :          0 :   size_t heigh = MDAL::toSizeT( ( vertexExtent.maxY - vertexExtent.minY ) / cell_size + 1 );
     823                 :          0 :   std::vector<std::vector<size_t>> vertexGrid( width, std::vector<size_t>( heigh, INVALID_INDEX ) );
     824                 :            : 
     825                 :          0 :   Vertices vertices;
     826                 :            : 
     827                 :          0 :   for ( size_t i = 0; i < cells.size(); ++i )
     828                 :            :   {
     829                 :          0 :     Face &e = faces[i];
     830                 :            : 
     831                 :          0 :     size_t xVertexIdx = MDAL::toSizeT( ( cells[i].x - vertexExtent.minX ) / cell_size );
     832                 :          0 :     size_t yVertexIdx = MDAL::toSizeT( ( cells[i].y - vertexExtent.minY ) / cell_size );
     833                 :            : 
     834                 :          0 :     for ( size_t position = 0; position < 4; ++position )
